Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether judicial review can be granted despite false testimony and omissions
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant found not credible due to inconsistencies and deliberate falsehoods
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 97(1) of IRPA regarding discretion in removal orders
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Asylum based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's deliberate false testimony and concealment of facts
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee protection hearing and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Refugee Protection Division and Federal Court
Crimes.Application_Error: False statements about departure date, route, and stay in Switzerland
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Newly submitted letter from Bishop Cornil deemed insufficient to reopen
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Unreasonableness of decision or clear incompetence of counsel required for review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Concealment of prior residence in a safe third country
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refugee claim rejected due to lack of credibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Misconduct during proceedings affecting fairness and outcome
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Deliberate misrepresentation and perjury during refugee hearing
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimony and omission of material facts
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Claimant had full opportunity to present case but failed to do so truthfully
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Material contradictions in travel history and foreign residence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Blame placed on former counsel for incorrect advice
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Timing and admissibility of new evidence post-hearing
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose residence in Switzerland

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review involving credibility of testimony
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether perjury disqualifies applicant from discretionary relief
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: False statements about travel and residence deemed intentional
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refugee claim dismissed due to dishonesty
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to show basis for review; prosecution need not prove perjury criminally
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Perjury undermines claim for relief and affects credibility
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Admissibility of new evidence after final decision
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Allegation of ineffective counsel causing false testimony
Crimes.Outcome_on_Merits: Application denied due to applicant’s own misconduct
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Hearing was fair; applicant chose to lie
Crimes.Legal_Framework: Federal Courts Act, IRPA, Criminal Code s. 131 (perjury)
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Claimed poor legal advice led to false statements
Crimes.Legal_Rule_Source: Common law and statutory provisions on perjury
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Certification of question of general importance and reopening
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Misrepresentation and perjury in sworn testimony
Crimes.Applicable_Process: Judicial review under section 72 of IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Perjury invalidates claims relying on credibility

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee determination involving fraud
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether false statements invalidate eligibility for judicial review
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant lacked credibility due to material omissions and lies
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fabricated narrative
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Refugee Protection Division and Federal Court
Crimes.Application_Error: False account of departure, route, and Swiss residence
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied by reviewing court
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: New evidence not considered due to prior dishonesty
Crimes.Application_Factor: Prior stay in a safe third country not disclosed
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to bad faith conduct
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Impact of fraud on procedural fairness and outcome
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Deliberate falsehoods in support of refugee claim
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Contradictory testimony and failure to disclose key facts
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process was fair; applicant compromised it through deceit
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about truthfulness on core aspects of claim
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Use of new evidence after final decision
